report.title: A Tease At This Dosage
report.author: Scroumf
report.bodytext: It tasted bitter. Not as bitter as some ecstasy tablets Ive had in the past, a kind of similar taste though, less acidic though. /n /n First alerts were a nice body feeling, remarkably similar to MDMA. This was turned up a notch by touch or by stretching. /n /n I experienced very minimal side effects. There was some extra burping, no real stomach issues, a little bit of muscle weirdness (no eye wiggles or jaw clenching or anything). There was also quite a powerful appetite suppression effect. /n /n There was a definite increased appreciation of music, some minor visuals. I was very awake. Strangely, my mindset seemed practically sober, I never once forgot what I was talking about it mid-sentence or anything like that, very on-the-ball. I may have been slightly more talkative and energetic than usual, but thats about it. /n /n I enjoyed it, though it was not much of a psychedelic, mind expanding time, at 10mg anyways. This seemed about as mind-blowing as a six of beer. Id call it a feel good hallucinogen (hallucinogen in the most visual/non-mental sense of the word). There was no really auditory or other senses affected, except maybe my sense of taste, it may have been slightly heightened. /n /n I could have easily handled this in public, or even around my parents or friends, and they would have had no idea. /n /n Although it was very enjoyable, it seemed to be almost a tease at this dosage. I would love to see what 15 or 20mg is like. On the Shulgin Scale Id rate this trip as a +1 for the most part, +2 around the peak time. /n /n I did it at 4pm today. I came down around 10pm. I feel 100% sober. I dont feel sketchy at all. I am however, noticeably more tired than I usually am at this time of night, my leg muscles are a little sore, but I have done a lot of walking today. The next day I was fine.
